roleset.name: form a network

example.name: create a network
example.text: Writers reticulate the three mortises to form an anastomosis.

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Created by Katie.
